def_cn: 卷入的;参与的;与…有密切关联的
def_en: If you are involved in a situation or activity, you are taking part in it or have a strong connection with it.
If you are involved in something, you give a lot of time, effort, or attention to it.
The things involved in something such as a job or system are the necessary parts or consequences of it.

def_cn: 复杂难懂的;棘手的;难处理的
def_en: If a situation or activity is involved, it has a lot of different parts or aspects, often making it difficult to understand, explain, or do.

def_cn: 关系暧昧的;有情爱关系的
def_en: If one person is involved with another, especially someone they are not married to, they are having a sexual or romantic relationship.
